description: Join four lifetime lady gamers as we craft our actual play 5th Edition Dungeons and Dragons podcast. The elven warlock Arrnodel Ithel (played by Brittany Quintero), the human monk Sawyeh Noor (Naseem Etemad), and the dwarven barbarian Kara Brunehilde (Sage Stafford), set out to find their gold and glory through the story telling of their Dungeon Master (Celeste Conowitch).
title: Venture Maidens | A Dungeons and Dragons Podcast

episodes.title: Episode 91: Outside the Box
episodes.description:
Our heroes lead a toy crusade to confront the kidnapping villain named Jack. Can they wrest the Keeper back from his clutches? Who made all of these wooden figures? Will our Maidens keep their promise?

Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidens   Facebook: facebook.com/venturemaidens   Twitter: @venturemaidens   Instagram: @venturemaidens  

Theme Music Composed by: Emily Meo https://soundcloud.com/emily-e-meo  

Midroll Music Composed by: Katie Truex http://www.celloharmony.com/

episodes.title: Episode 90: Toy Story
episodes.description:
Our Maidens return to the maze only to find they aren't as alone as they thought. Can they trust this helpful stranger? Where does the next gate lead? What's it like to be made of wood?This episode is sponsored by Jeff Stevens Games, find out more about the company and their Kickstarter 'Adventures from the Potbellied Kobold' at kickstarter.com/projects/adventures-from-the-potbellied-kobold

  Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidens   Facebook: facebook.com/venturemaidens   Twitter: @venturemaidens   Instagram: @venturemaidens

episodes.title: Episode 89: Opening Gambit
episodes.description:
Our heroes burn back the brush to reach the captured guardian. Can our heroes conquer the killer weeds? What has caused the forest to go berserk? Will the guardian help our heroes escape this gate?This episode is sponsored by Jeff Stevens Games, find out more about the company and their Kickstarter 'Adventures from the Potbellied Kobold' at kickstarter.com/projects/adventures-from-the-potbellied-kobold

episodes.title: Podcasts of the Frostmaiden: All Things Considered
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear our tale: the maidens are called to the frozen north in hopes of discovering where a missing group of scientists have gone. What has happened to the gnomish crew? Can a new friend lead our pack to safety? Will the frozen scape of Icewind Dale prove too deadly for our heroes?Find out in Venture Maidens Podcasts of the Frostmaiden: All Things ConsideredContent Warning: This episode contains themes of claustrophobia, body horror, and violence against animalsThis episode features special guest Mikayla Ebel! You can find them on Twitter @mcboots41 and view their work at https://mikaylaebel.com/Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidensFacebook: facebook.com/venturemaidensTwitter: @venturemaidensInstagram: @venturemaidensTheme Music Composed by: https://soundcloud.com/emily-e-meo

episodes.title: Episode 88: Crimson and Clover
episodes.description:
Our Maidens explore the forest beyond the gate and are hired by the locals to solve a growing problem. What quest lies ahead for our heroes? Will the enigmatic guardian have answers for our crew? Is Clover a good boy?

Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidens   Facebook: facebook.com/venturemaidens   Twitter: @venturemaidens   Instagram: @venturemaidens

episodes.title: Episode 87: Labyrinth
episodes.description:
Our heroes manage to bring Sawyeh back from the brink, but they must find a way back into the titan's lair. Can our Maidens solve the bloody maze? What dangers does the lair of Menoetius hold? Has our crew finally gained the upper hand?   Pick up a copy of Celeste's new adventure 'Dino World' on the DM's Guild dmsguild.com/product/Dino-WorldThis episode is sponsored by Mage Hand Press, find out more about the company and their Dark Matter Kickstarter at kickstarter.com/projects/magehandpress   Fan of the show? episodes.title: Venture Maidens Play Wardlings
episodes.description:
It's a super special episode of Venture Maidens! Join us for a one-shot in the new D&D campaign setting Wardlings.

Our group of youngsters has noticed something is amiss in their tropical village. What will their investigation in the forest uncover?

The Wardlings Campaign Guide brings an enchanted new campaign setting to life, where the minds of the youth, uncorrupted by the vices and responsibilities of their elders, are able to perceive magical creatures and events in the world around them, where adults cannot.Purchase your copy: https://www.renegadegamestudios.com/wardlings

Follow the GM:http://twitter.com/staffofsage

Follow the Cast:http://twitter.com/dropthediehttp://twitter.com/thistleravenhttp://twitter.com/thewillyboohttp://twitter.com/childofginevra

The world of Or’Mya awaits its mighty champions. What kind of hero will you be?

episodes.title: Episode 86: Catspaw
episodes.description:
Our Maidens take up arms to defend the outpost, but the threats are pouring in from all sides. Can the mages survive this undeadly attack? What are these ghastly servitors really after? Will Sawyeh discover the way to the titan's domain in time?This episode is sponsored by Mage Hand Press, find out more about the company and their Dark Matter Kickstarter at kickstarter.com/projects/magehandpress   Fan of the show? episodes.title: Venture Maidens: Descent Into Doom
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear a little bit different tale, this time our heroes have been recruited by the mysterious 'Dwarven Forge' to go on a side quest in pursuit of two powerful artifacts. Can they survive their Descent Into Doom? Will they be able to find these fabled glyph stones? What strange horrors await them in Zoltar's dark dungeon? We’re pleased to present this actual play session in collaboration with Dwarven Forge:https://www.dwarvenforge.com/The Dungeon of Doom is a module made by Dwarven Forge. It is set up to be used with 5e, and can be traversed by your level five and six characters easily. It is full of maps, artifacts, and adventures all in 15 encounters. Featured in this episode are Encounters 4: "Deadly Corners" and Encounter 7: "Gorgon Tiers"! Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidensFacebook: facebook.com/venturemaidensTwitter: @venturemaidensInstagram: @venturemaidensTheme Music Composed by: https://soundcloud.com/emily-e-meo

episodes.title: Podcasts of Waterdeep Episode: Curtain Call
episodes.description: Join us for another special episode from the Wizards of the Coast launch event 'Podcasts of Waterdeep' to celebrate the release of 'Waterdeep Dragon Heist'The Venture Maidens are called to Waterdeep to aid the city officials in a mad treasure hunt. Will the Maidens get by with a little help from their Bard friends?This special episode we are joined by Krystina Arielle from 'Sirens of the Realms' & Kyle Claset from BomBARDed.Fan of the show? episodes.title: Venture Maidens Podcasts of Foes Episode: Maiden Voyage
episodes.description: It's a special episode! Here is our Podcasts of Foes contribution to the Wizards of the Coast for the launch of their new core book: Mordenkainen's Tome of FoesThis episode was originally published 5/4/18 on the Dungeon Delve FeedThe Maidens are pulled from their quest as reports of a mysterious flying ship reach the Elysium Keep. Our heroes must investigate the strange vessel to suss out what new threat has descended from the skies. Who are these alien travelers? Why have they appeared? What lies in wait behind this worlds veil?Find out in our Tome of Foes Episode: Maiden Voyage Liked what you heard? Check out our regular Venture Maidens Podcast stream on iTunes, or wherever podcasts are free. New episodes publish every other Sunday!Fan of the show? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation at patreon.com/venturemaidensFacebook: facebook.com/venturemaidensTwitter: @venturemaidensInstagram: @venturemaidens

episodes.description: The agents of the Elysium Keep are now reunited, and our Maidens are able to seek some well needed counsel. What is the meaning of Arrnodels new artifact? episodes.title: Episode 32: Shadows & Sewers
episodes.description: The Maidens are now waist deep in sewage and subterfuge as they race to spring Rem out of the Eladrin prison. What kind of trap have Arrnodel and Sawyeh sprung? Will Kara escape the tide of undead in one piece? What magic mystery has Valerius packed into this bag?Fan of the show? episodes.title: Episode 31: Maiden Impossible
episodes.description: Our heroes have returned from their trial beneath the archives, now they are back with a mission in mind! Who is this fancy new carriage guy? Consider helping us with a Patreon donation.Discord: https://discord.gg/kFYxxz9Facebook: facebook.com/venturemaidensTwitter: @venturemaidensInstagram: @venturemaidensMusic By: Table Top Music

episodes.title: Episode 30: The Passenger (Part 3)
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear the absolute last of the final piece we promise: our heroes are in a strange twisted hall to get to their big bad foe. How will they handle all the cats? Is gardening taking a turn for the worse? Can Sawyeh survive a big reveal?Find out in Episode 30 The Passenger (Part 3)Like our stuff? Leave us a review here! A serious fan? Consider helping us grow with just $1 a month on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/venturemaidensOr find us on social media:@venturemaidens on TwitterYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 30: The Passenger (Part 2)
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear the final piece of our tale: our heroes have been led to the ancient archives at the heart of the university. What's up with this shiny horse? Where are the Maidens being led? Whose magic has infested this place?You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 30: The Passenger  (Part 1)
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear the final piece of our tale: this time our heroes face the perils of the Eladrin city. With their leader gone, and a mission to find a cure, the Maidens find themselves lured by something nefarious. Wow they really have concrete here? When is a horse not really a horse? Will Sawyeh learn the secrets of the mysterious masked man?Will the Maidens survive all this? We hope so...You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 29: Off the Record
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear another tale, one in the neighborhood: this week a different set of heroes find themselves in peril beneath the capitol city's street. How does this relate to the main quest at all? What strange ancients craft such scandalous scrolls? What stirs within the ancient archives?This episode also features a special guest. Find him all over the internet as Nerd Immersion, or at his website: http://www.nerdimmersion.com/You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 28: Trials
episodes.description: This week the Maidens leave the Keep, ready to resolve their strange message from the skies. What's with all thesecryptic notes? Can you believe this crazy romance? Will the Maidens find answers before time runs out?Find out in Episode 28: TrialsYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 27: Not That Kind Of Three Way
episodes.description: This week our heroes hold court at the Elysium Keep. How will Rem respond to the strange bird call? Has Kara met her unlikely match? Will Vlad's shoulder shape ever be quantified?Find out in Episode 27: Not That Kind of Three WayYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 26: Punch Drunk Maidens
episodes.description: This time are heroes are left to their devices as the Keep operatives race to find answers. What ill has befallen Isolde? How is Sawyeh handling her recent blast from the past? Are Arrnodel and Aaron finally going to happen? Find out in Episode 26: Punch Drunk MaidensYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 25: Y Tu Agua Tambien
episodes.description: This week we delve into Sawyeh's story and fill in the gaps of our stalwart's Monk past. Can Naseem and Celeste handle the pressure of one on one? What is link between an elemental goddess and Sawyeh's mother? Does this threat go deeper than the Maidens ever imagined?Find out in Episode 25: Y Tu Agua TambienYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 24: Return of the Maidens
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear our tale: this week the Maidens find themselves bloody and broken with a few strange allies showing up in the nick of time. Will everyone make it back to the Keep in one piece? What will the big three say about our heroes exploits? Is Sawyeh ready to face the consequences of her magical misconduct? Find out in Episode 24: Return of the MaidensYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Podcasts of Annihilation Episode: Why Does It Always Have to Be Snakes
episodes.description: This week the Maidens team up with an all star team of real play podcasters from 'You Meet In a Tavern' and 'Taking Initiative' to give you a look at the new Wizards of the Coast publication: 'Tomb of Annihilation' the Maidens are over the moon to bring you this slice of Chultan jungle pie as part of the 'Podcasts of Annihilation Project'.Don't worry, things still get really really messy.

episodes.title: Episode 23: When Dolphins Cry
episodes.description: This week finds our heroes in a battle to the death (Or perhaps undeath). Can the Maidens turn the tide against the nightmare creatures? Is this beholder fight everything you wanted Celeste? Has our team tempted fate for the last time?Find out in Episode 23: When Dolphins CryYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 22: Paradise Lost
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear our tale: this week things get wet and wild as our heroes find themselves stranded in a far corner of the world. Will the Maidens be able to find each other? What evil lurks in this tropical place? Can our heroes make their way back to the Elysium Keep?You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Q & A Episode: Year One
episodes.description: What's this? Our heroes take a break from their regular programming to answer some of your questions! Hear the Maidens dish on everything from in game play to our favorite game snacks. Special thanks to our Patreon donors for submitting all these rad questions.You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 21 (Part 2): Levees Break
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear our tale: this week we bring you a dramatic conclusion as our heroes parlay with a demon. What mysteries will the Maidens uncover? What is the source of the Breach's water? Where in the world do we go from here?You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 21 (Part 1): Levees Break
episodes.description: This week our story begins with a bang as our heroes find themselves in the middle of a battle royale. Can the Maidens stop the demons rampage? Where did all these fey come from? What's up with the giant glowing doors?Find out in Episode 21: Levees BreakYou can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 20: Grip the Whip​
episodes.description: This week our quest turns more mysterious as the Maidens square off with the dungeons aquatic inhabitants. Who made these strange caverns? What creature is whispering from the dark? Will Kara let Sawyeh & Arrnodel keep their new pet? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 19: Making Waves
episodes.description: This week our heroes perform daring feats of acrobatics. Will Kara survive her fall? What secrets lie in these dark caves? What ancient force have the Maidens stumbled upon?​You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 18: Kara's Flying Circus
episodes.description: This week our Maidens find themselves in a psychedelic situation beneath the streets of Bastard's Breach. Are our heroes in for a bad trip? What monsters lurk in the winding tunnels? Will they complete their quest before time runs out?

episodes.title: Recap Episode 1-17
episodes.description: This week we are mixing it up with a bonus recap episode! This is the perfect episode for new listeners who want to get up to speed on the story so far, for those who want to skip the lower audio quality of the early episodes, or for those who just want a condensed reminder of everything that has happened in our story so far. This episode won't have any new content, just major spoilers if you aren't caught up.You can find all our social media, live stream, and Patreon links at our website www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 17: The End of the Beginning
episodes.description: This week the Maidens pack there bags and head out on their first assignment as official members of the Sisters of Sorrow. What will our heroes encounter in Bastard's Breach? Can the Maidens retrieve the wayward intelligence specialist? What dangers lie in the city's catacombs? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 16: Three Maidens Walk Into A Bar
episodes.description: This week our heroes meet the inhabitants of the Elysium Keep. Where did these strange folks come from? Will our Dungeon Master remember all these NPC voices? How many ales can Kara get on the house? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 15: Keep of Sorrows
episodes.description: This week our heroes finally reach their destination. How will Sawyeh deal with her brush with the past? What wonders does the fortress hold? What new dangers lie ahead for the Maidens? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 14: Veils by Comparison
episodes.description: This week our heroes to battle with the strange band of hunters. Will they make in out of this fight alive? When will they reach the Sisters Keep? What secrets does that mask hide? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Bonus Episode: A Hangover to Remember (Part 1)
episodes.description: This week we're mixing things up with a special one shot episode. Brittany Quintero is moving into the DM seat for this story. This episode also features our first guest maiden, the talented Lizzy Dorrel from the Dank Dungeons Show. Different story, different heroes, a whole lot of fun! This is the first part of our two part special.You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 13: A Roc and A Hard Place
episodes.description: This week our heroes face the perils of a new land with dire prospects. Where have the Maidens found themselves now? Who is this strange new wizard who now leads the journey? Will the Maidens gain the answers they seek? Will Arnnodel reconcile with her newly monikered love? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 12: Some Strings Attached
episodes.description: This week our heroes learn what the mysterious sisters have in store. What are the Maidens up against? Can this web untangle itself? Will Kara ever get that whiskey? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 11: Axes and Allies
episodes.description: Gather round travelers to hear our tale: This week our heroes reach the final chapter of the Sisters Trial. Will the Maidens get their answers? What will the stone tell our adventurers this week? How many references can we fit in one episode?You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 10: Snakes on the Planes
episodes.description: This week our heroes press on through the treacherous castle in the mist. What does this place have in store? Where are these visions coming from? How many monks does it take to catch an arrow? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 9: Into The Mist
episodes.description: This week our heroes find themselves victorious over the monstrous Madame Fortuna. What do the Sisters have planned for their final test? Will Kara ever shake her bird brain instincts? Are the Maidens facing their most deadly challenge yet? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 8: Just Rewards
episodes.description: This week our heroes continue their battle against the troupes monstrosities, and things are starting to look grim. Will the Maidens survive this fight? What other tricks lie up the Sorceresses sleeves? Have the Sisters taken this test way too far? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 7: Flock of Blows
episodes.description: This week our heroes find themselves squaring off against the mysterious Madame Fortuna. Are any of these folks what they seem? What's with the dead toad stick? Is this challenge rating way too high? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 6: Cardinal Rule
episodes.description: This week the maidens must escape this magical trap before they lose more than just their way. When is a door not really a door? Are feathers the new thing for Dwarven fashion? And why, does it always have to be snakes? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 5: Behind Door Number One
episodes.description: This week our heroes must survive the Mirrored Maze's Horrors. Will they save the wayward bar wench? Can you contract avian flu from a macaw bite? Has anyone actually ever had fun in a fun house? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 4: Look Who's Monking Now
episodes.description: This week our heroes find themselves in the midst of an ambush. Who is this strange Madame Fortuna? What secret does the road show hide? Can the maidens defeat these brigands? You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 3: Axe to the Knee
episodes.description: This week our heroes carry out the final leg of their quest. What is causing the curse upon Middleton? Can country farmers learn the lesson of forgiveness? Will the Maidens ever get paid?Disclaimer: This episode, and several other early episodes have significantly lower audio quality than our later episodes. If you would prefer to jump in to those later episodes due to quality, check out our ‘Recap’ episode which will catch you up on the story so far from Episode 1-17.You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 2: Wolves, Warlocks, and Demons, Oh My!
episodes.description: This week our heroes further face the perils of the forest. Who is the mysterious Martin? Are darts to the butt the key to victory? Can they stop the thrall of wayward youth before things turn for the worse?Disclaimer: This episode, and several other early episodes have significantly lower audio quality than our later episodes. If you would prefer to jump in to those later episodes due to quality, check out our ‘Recap’ episode which will catch you up on the story so far from Episode 1-17.You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com

episodes.title: Episode 1: Bringing Home the Bacon
episodes.description: Join four lifetime lady gamers as we craft our real play 5th Edition Dungeons and Dragons podcast. The elven warlock Arrnodel Ithel (played by Brittany Quintero), the human monk Sawyeh Noor (Naseem Etemad), and the dwarven barbarian Kara Brunehilde (Sage Stafford), set out to find their gold and glory through the story telling of their Dungeon Master (Celeste Conowitch) See the beginning of our heroes journey. From humble origins: between trying to keep kosher in pig town and yoga mat squabbles. Our three adventurers rise to the occasion as they take on their first test from the mysterious 'Sisters of Sorrow'. What is the mystery of Middleton? Will they find the cause in time? Or will the bears get them first?Disclaimer: This episode, and several other early episodes have significantly lower audio quality than our later episodes. If you would prefer to jump in to those later episodes due to quality, check out our ‘Recap’ episode which will catch you up on the story so far from Episode 1-17.You can find all our social media, livestream, and Patreon links at our website: www.theventuremaidens.com
